FuncDef: The display mld-snooping bas invalid-packet command displays statistics about invalid MLD messages on BAS interfaces.
CLIs: display mld-snooping bas invalid-packet { user-id <user-id> | all | all-user } [ message-type { report | done | query } ]

ParaDef.Info:
Displays statistics about invalid MLD messages with a specified user ID on BAS interfaces.
user-id specifies the user ID.
The value is an integer ranging from 0 to 4294967295.

Displays statistics about invalid MLD messages on BAS interfaces of all users.
-

Displays statistics about invalid MLD messages on BAS interfaces of each user respectively.
-

Displays statistics about the invalid MLD messages with a specified message type on BAS interfaces.
-

Displays statistics about invalid Report messages on BAS interfaces.
-

Displays statistics about invalid Done messages on BAS interfaces.
-

Displays statistics about invalid Query messages on BAS interfaces.
-

Examples: Statistics of invalid packets for user-id 65:
Invalid Multicast Source : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Invalid MLD Version      : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Invalid MLD Version      : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Statistics of invalid packets for all users:
Invalid Multicast Source : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Invalid MLD Version      : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Invalid MLD Version      : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Statistics of invalid packets for user-id 65:
Invalid Multicast Source : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Invalid MLD Version      : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
Invalid MLD Version      : 0           Invalid Multicast Group  : 0
ExtraInfo: To check statistics about invalid MLD messages on BAS interfaces, run the display mld-snooping bas invalid-packet command. The command output helps determine whether invalid messages cause unsuccessful creation of MLD entries.
